subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
lead_paragraph: Looking to expand the Breeders’ Cup and broaden its appeal, the organizers of the series announced Monday that three races have been added to the event and that it will be held over two days.
snippet: Looking to expand the Breeders’ Cup and broaden its appeal, the organizers of the series announced Monday that three races have been added to the event and that it will be held over two days.
